properties.name: review.generation.thread-pool-size
properties.description: Number of threads allocated for processing.

properties.name: review.generation.max-queue-size
properties.description: Maximum size of the executor queue.

properties.name: review.generation.preferred-domains
properties.description: List of preferred domains to fetch content from.

properties.name: review.generation.max-search
properties.description: Maximum number of search queries allowed.

properties.name: review.generation.max-total-tokens
properties.description: Maximum total number of tokens allowed for aggregation.

properties.name: review.generation.source-min-tokens
properties.description: Minimum number of tokens required for a source to be considered.

properties.name: review.generation.source-max-tokens
properties.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed per source.

properties.name: review.generation.max-concurrent-fetch
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent URL fetch operations.

properties.name: review.generation.refresh-delay-months
properties.description: Delay in months after which an existing AI review is considered outdated.

properties.name: review.generation.estimated-time
properties.description: Estimated time for review generation process. Used to compute remaining time.

properties.name: review.generation.regeneration-delay-days
properties.description: Delay in days after which a successful AI review is considered outdated and can be regenerated.

properties.name: review.generation.retry-delay-days
properties.description: Delay in days after which an unsuccessful AI review generation (insufficient data) can be retried.

properties.name: review.generation.prompt-key
properties.description: Prompt key used for external-source review generation.

properties.name: review.generation.grounded-prompt-key
properties.description: Prompt key used for model-native web search review generation.

properties.name: review.generation.use-grounded-prompt
properties.description: Enable model-native web search prompt flow.

properties.name: review.generation.batch-poll-interval
properties.description: Interval between batch status scans for review generation jobs.

properties.name: review.generation.batch-schedule-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduled batch review generation.

properties.name: review.generation.batch-schedule-size
properties.description: Number of products to include in scheduled batch review generation.
